fusetools.financial_tools.InteractiveBrokers¶

class fusetools.financial_tools.InteractiveBrokers[source]¶

Bases: object

Interactive Brokers API.

Methods

get_stock_price_ss

Returns the latest stock price for a given ticker.

ib_connect

Connects IB API to an Interactive Brokers TWS application.

ib_get_open_orders

Returns a Pandas DataFrame of details for open orders in the account.

ib_get_portfolio

Returns a Pandas DataFrame of details for portfolio holdings.

ib_place_order

Places an order.
classmethod get_stock_price_ss(ib, ticker)[source]¶

Returns the latest stock price for a given ticker.

Parameters

  • ib – InteractiveBrokers account instance

  • ticker – Ticker to search

Returns

Latest stock price for a given ticker

classmethod ib_connect(port, client_id, host='127.0.0.1')[source]¶

Connects IB API to an Interactive Brokers TWS application.

Parameters

  • port – TWS port to allow API connection.

  • client_id – TWS client id.

  • host – TWS host.

Returns

IB connection object for account.

classmethod ib_get_open_orders(ib)[source]¶

Returns a Pandas DataFrame of details for open orders in the account.

Parameters

ib – InteractiveBrokers account instance

Returns

Pandas DataFrame of open orders

classmethod ib_get_portfolio(ib)[source]¶

Returns a Pandas DataFrame of details for portfolio holdings.

Parameters

ib – InteractiveBrokers account instance

Returns

Pandas DataFrame of portfolio holding sizes, tickers and cost-bases

classmethod ib_place_order(ib, ticker, action, trade_type, buy_d=False, sell_d=False, profit_taker_d=False)[source]¶

Places an order.

Parameters

  • ticker – Ticker to execute trade on.

  • action – ‘BUY’ or ‘SELL’

  • trade_type – ‘bracket’, ‘limit’, ‘market’ order.

  • buy_d – Dictionary in form of {‘size’:shares_to_order,’price’:price_to_execute}

  • sell_d – Dictionary in form of {‘size’:shares_to_order,’price’:price_to_execute}

  • profit_taker_d – Dictionary of {size:price} for upside limit prices.

Returns

JSON response of trades placed.
